# Leo Perales

   [City Councilmembers](https://www.pasco-wa.gov/Directory.aspx?DID=4) 

Title: Councilmember, District 3

Phone: [509-544-3060]() 

 [Contact Councilmember Perales](https://www.pasco-wa.gov/formcenter/City-Manager-7/Contact-Councilmember-Leo-Perales-81)  

Current Term:

January 1, 2024 - December 31, 2027
